issue.title: panorama.pub
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://panorama.pub/news/vakcinu-ot-besenstva-ispytaut-na](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpanorama.pub%2Fnews%2Fvakcinu-ot-besenstva-ispytaut-na) ### Comment > При открытии ссылок в Telegram, мессенжер использует для их просмотра встроенный браузер, в котором Adguard не блокирует рекламу ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ldd8c7v0klsck8o4wkcsw4sosckcok4itf388xpvhk.jpg?nc=1)

Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1vh7oeo9m7hccocgo488go4kkgkcw0gjpsdcpl3n28.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.7 System version: | Android 14 Browser: | Встроенный браузер Telegram License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection options: | Send Do-Not-Track header,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320) DNS filtering: | server: `System`

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: com.dubox.drive

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dubox.drive

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

trk.svr-algorix.com
trk.rixengine.com
myaudioads.com

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/my-drive](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdrive.google.com%2Fdrive%2Fu%2F1%2Fmy-drive) ### Comment > Google Drive is always offline. Using extension version 5.0.173 > > After enabling the provided filters above, Google Drive will report being offline. After disabling AdGuard, Google Drive will report being online and you can access your files as normal. Username: `@Duued` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/sshx2pbhmjkkoogg8kg08k8gkc4gk4wrhtbjybpjn4.png?nc=1)
